import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import whatever from './data.json' function Playground() { const [currentStreak, setcurrentStreak] = useState(0) const [questions, setQuestions] = useState([]); var index=0; const [cardsAnswered, setcardsAnswered] = useState(0) useEffect(() => { whatever.map() }, []); return (

How to play

  • Swipe card to the right after you both answer.
  • Swipe card to the left if you decide to skip.

) } export default Playground
